 12429                                  
 12430                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12431                                  ;	get media id
 12432                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12433                                  ;
 12434                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12435                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12436                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12437                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12438                                  ;
 12439                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12440                                  ;
 12441                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12442                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12443                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12444                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12445                                  ;
 12446                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12447                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12448                                  ;
 12449                                  ; LOGIC:
 12450                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12451                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12452                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12453                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12454                                  ;
 12455                                  ; {
 12456                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12457                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12458                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12459                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12460                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12461                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12462                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12463                                  ;		};
 12464                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12465                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12466                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12467                                  ;		};
 12468                                  ;	else
 12469                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12470                                  ;
 12471                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12472                                  
 12473                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12474                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12475                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12476                                  
 12477                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12478                                  GetMediaId:
 12479 0000115D E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12480 00001160 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12481 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12482 00001169 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12483 0000116C 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12484                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12485 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12486                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12487 00001173 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12488                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12489 00001175 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12490 00001178 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12491                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12492                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12493 0000117B 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12494 0000117D C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12495 00001181 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12496                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12497 00001185 46                      		inc	si
 12498                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12499                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12500 00001186 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12501 00001189 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12502                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12503                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12504 0000118C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12505                                  	
 12506                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12507                                  		; cf = 0
 12508                                  		;clc
 12509                                  
 12510 0000118E C3                      		retn
 12511                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12512                                  
 12513                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12514 0000118F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12515 00001191 F9                      		stc
 12516                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12517 00001192 C3                      		retn
 12518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12519                                  
 12520                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12521                                  
 12522                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12523                                  ;  set media id
 12524                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12525                                  
 12526                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12527                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12528                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12529                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12530                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12531                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12532                                  ;
 12533                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12534                                  ;
 12535                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12536                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12537                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12538                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12539                                  ;
 12540                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12541                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12542                                  ;
 12543                                  ; logic:
 12544                                  ;
 12545                                  ; {
 12546                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12547                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12548                                  ;	BootIo;
 12549                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12550                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12551                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12552                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12553                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12554                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12555                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12556                                  ;		};
 12557                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12558                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12559                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12560                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12561                                  ;		};
 12562                                  ;	else
 12563                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12564                                  ;
 12565                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12566                                  
 12567                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12568                                  SetMediaId:
 12569 00001193 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12570 00001196 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12571                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12572 0000119A 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12573 0000119C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12574 000011A1 52                      		push	dx
 12575 000011A2 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12576 000011A5 5A                      		pop	dx
 12577 000011A6 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12578                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12579 000011A8 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12580                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12581 000011AD 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12582 000011AF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12583                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12584 000011B4 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12585 000011B6 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12586 000011B7 57                      		push	di
 12587 000011B8 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12588 000011B9 07                      		pop	es
 12589 000011BA BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12590 000011BD C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12591 000011C1 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12592 000011C4 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12593 000011C7 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12594                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12595                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12596 000011CA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12597 000011CC 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12598 000011CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12599 000011CE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12600 000011CF 07                      		pop	es
 12601 000011D0 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12602 000011D3 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12603 000011D5 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12604 000011DA E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12605 000011DD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12606                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12607                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12608 000011E2 C3                      		retn
 12609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12610                                  
 12611                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12612 000011E3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12613 000011E5 F9                      		stc
 12614                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12615 000011E6 C3                      		retn
 12616                                  
 12617                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12618                                  
 12619                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12620                                  
 12621                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12622                                  ;	BootIo
 12623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12624                                  ;
 12625                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12626                                  ;
 12627                                  ; input :
 12628                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12629                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12630                                  ;
 12631                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12632                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12633                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12634                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12635                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12636                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12637                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12638                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12639                                  ;
 12640                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12641                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12642                                  ;
 12643                                  ; logic:
 12644                                  ;
 12645                                  ; {
 12646                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12647                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12648                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12649                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12650                                  ; }
 12651                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12652                                  
 12653                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12654                                  BootIo:	
 12655 000011E7 06                      		push	es
 12656 000011E8 57                      		push	di
 12657 000011E9 53                      		push	bx
 12658 000011EA 1E                      		push	ds
 12659 000011EB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12660                                  
 12661                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12662                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12663                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12664                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12665                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12666                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12667                                  
 12668 000011EC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12669 000011EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12670 000011F1 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12671 000011F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12672 000011F8 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12673 000011FB 5B                      		pop	bx
 12674 000011FC 5F                      		pop	di
 12675 000011FD 07                      		pop	es
 12676 000011FE C3                      		retn
 12677                                  
 12678                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12679                                  
 12680                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12681                                  
 12682                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12683                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12684                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12685                                  ;
 12686                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12687                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12688                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12689                                  ; history in the flags.
 12690                                  ;
 12691                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12692                                  ;
 12693                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12694                                  ;
 12695                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12696                                  ;
 12697                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12698                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12699                                  ;
 12700                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12701                                  
 12702                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12703 000011FF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12704 00001203 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12705 00001205 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12706                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12707 00001207 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12708                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12709                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12710 0000120C 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12711 0000120E 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12712 00001213 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12713 00001215 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12714 00001218 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12715                                  
 12716                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12717                                  
 12718 0000121A B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12719 0000121C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12720                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12721                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12722 0000121E 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12723 00001220 53                      		push	bx
 12724 00001221 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12725                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12726                                  					; physical drive
 12727 00001224 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12728 00001227 5B                      		pop	bx
 12729                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12730 00001228 C3                      		retn
 12731                                  
 12732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12733                                  
 12734                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12735                                  
 12736                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12737                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12738                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12739                                  ;
 12740                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12741                                  ;
 12742                                  ; INPUT :
 12743                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12744                                  ;
 12745                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12746                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12747                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12748                                  
 12749                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12750                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12751 00001229 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12752 0000122D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12753                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12754                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12755 00001230 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12756                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12757 00001232 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12758                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12759                                  					; unformatted_media
 12760 00001237 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12761 00001239 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12762                                  
 12763                                  GafDone:				
 12764 0000123B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12765 0000123E C3                      		retn
 12766                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12767                                  
 12768                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12769                                  
 12770                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12771                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12772                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12773                                  ;
 12774                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12775                                  ;
 12776                                  ; input :
 12777                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12778                                  ;
 12779                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12780                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12781                                  
 12782                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12783                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12784 0000123F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12785 00001243 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12786                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12787 00001246 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12788                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12789                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12790 0000124B 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12791 0000124F 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12792                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12793 00001251 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12794                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12795                                  					; unformatted_media
 12796                                  saf_Done:				
 12797 00001256 C3                      		retn
 12798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12799                                  
 12800                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12801                                  
 12802                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12803                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12804                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12805                                  ;
 12806                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12807                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12808                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12809                                  ;
 12810                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12811                                  
 12812                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12813                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12814 00001257 06                      		push	es
 12815 00001258 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12816 0000125C 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12817                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12818 00001260 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12819                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12820 00001262 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12821 00001264 0E                      		push	cs
 12822 00001265 07                      		pop	es
 12823 00001266 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12824                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12825 00001269 BF[3A0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12826                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12827                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12828 0000126C 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12829 0000126E F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12830 00001270 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12831 00001272 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12832                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12833                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12834                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12835                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12836                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12837                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12838                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12839 00001275 07                      		pop	es
 12840                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12841                                  		; cf = 0
 12842                                  		;clc
 12843 00001276 C3                      		retn
 12844                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12845                                  nosupport:				
 12846 00001277 07                      		pop	es
 12847 00001278 E95AEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12848                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12849                                  
 12850                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12851                                  
 12852                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12853                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12854                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12855                                  ;
 12856                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12857                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12858                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12859                                  ;	    drive)
 12860                                  ;
 12861                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12862                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12863                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12864                                  ;
 12865                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12866                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12867                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12868                                  ;
 12869                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12870                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12871                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12872                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12873                                  ;
 12874                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12875                                  ;
 12876                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12877                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12878                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12879                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12880                                  ; 
 12881                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12882                                  
 12883                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12884                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12885 0000127B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12886 0000127F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12887                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12888                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12889 00001282 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12890 00001284 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12891                                  		;
 12892 00001286 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12893                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12894                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12895                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12896 0000128A B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12897                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12898 0000128C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12899 0000128E 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12900 00001290 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12901                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12902 00001292 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12903 00001294 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12904 00001296 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12905 00001298 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12906 0000129A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12907 0000129C 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12908 0000129E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12909 000012A0 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12910                                  GotMediaType:				
 12911 000012A2 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12912                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12913                                  		; cf = 0
 12914                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12915 000012A5 C3                      		retn
 12916                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12917                                  
 12918                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12919 000012A6 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12920 000012A9 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 12921 000012AB B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 12922 000012AD 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12923 000012B0 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12924                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 12925 000012B2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 12926                                  SenseErrExit:				
 12927 000012B4 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 12928 000012B6 F9                      		stc
 12929 000012B7 C3                      		retn
 12930                                  
 12931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12932                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12933                                  		;db    0
 12934                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12935                                  
 12936                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12937                                  
 12938                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12939                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12940                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12941                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12942                                  
 12943                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12944                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12945                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12946                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12947                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12948                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12949                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12950                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12951                                  ;
 12952                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12953                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12954                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12955                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12956                                  ;
 12957                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12958                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12959                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12960                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12961                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12962                                  ;
 12963                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12964                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12965                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12966                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12967                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12968                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12969                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12970                                  
 12971                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12972                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12973                                  
 12974                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12975                                  
 12976                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12977 000012B8 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12978 000012BB 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12979 000012BD 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12980 000012C0 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12981                                  
 12982                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12983                                  
 12984 000012C2 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12985 000012C5 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 12986 000012C7 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 12987 000012CA 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12988 000012CC E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12989                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12990                                  
 12991                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12992 000012CF CF                      		iret
 12993                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12994                                  
 12995                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 12996 000012D0 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 12997 000012D1 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12998                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12999                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13000                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13001 000012D3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13002                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13003                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13004                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13005                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13006                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13007 000012D8 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 13008 000012DC FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13009 000012E0 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 13010 000012E4 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13011                                  
 13012                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13013                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13014                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13015                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13016 000012E8 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 13017 000012EC A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13018 000012EF 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 13019 000012F3 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13020                                  
 13021 000012F7 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13022 000012F8 5B                      		pop	bx
 13023 000012F9 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13024 000012FA 5A                      		pop	dx
 13025 000012FB 58                      		pop	ax
 13026                                  i2f_iret:				
 13027 000012FC CF                      		iret
 13028                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13029                                  
 13030                                  mine:					
 13031 000012FD 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13032 000012FF 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13033 00001301 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13034 00001303 7504                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13035 00001305 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13036 00001307 EBF3                    		jmp	short i2f_iret

 13050                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]

 13055 0000131B 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es

 13060 00001320 EA[9608]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13061                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13062                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13063                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13064                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf

 13067                                  
 13068                                  do_subfun_01:				
 13069 00001325 06                      		push	es
