 14256 0000176E 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14257 00001770 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14257 00001779 736B6574746520666F-
 14257 00001782 7220647269766520   
 14258                                  
 14259                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14260 0000178A 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14260 00001793 65737320616E79206B-
 14260 0000179C 6579207768656E2072-
 14260 000017A5 656164790D0A       
 14261 000017AB 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14262                                  
 14263                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14264                                  
 14265                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14266                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14267                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14268                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14269                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14270                                  
 14271                                  chkopcnt:		
 14272 000017AD 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14273 000017B2 C3                      		retn
 14274                                  
 14275                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14276                                  
 14277                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14278                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14279                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14280                                  ;
 14281                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14282                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14283                                  
 14284                                  mediacheck:	
 14285 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14286 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14287 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14288 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14289 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14290 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14291 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 14292 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 14293 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14294                                  					; set logical drive number
 14295 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14296 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14297                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14298                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14299 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 14300 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 14301 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14302 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14303                                  
 14304                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14305                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14306                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14307                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14308                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14309                                  ; status.
 14310                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14311 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14312 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14313                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14314                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14315                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14316                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14317 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14318                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14319                                  
 14320                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14321                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14322                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14323                                  
 14324 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 14325 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 14326 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 14327 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14328 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14329 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 14330 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 14331 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14332 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14333                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14334 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14335                                  mediaret:				
 14336 000017EC C3                      		retn
 14337                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14338                                  
 14339                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14340                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14341                                  ; or write.
 14342                                  
 14343                                  mediadovolid:				
 14344 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14345 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14346 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14347 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14348 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14349                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14350                                  
 14351                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14352                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14353                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14354                                  ; dos.
 14355                                  ;
 14356                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14357                                  
 14358                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14359                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14360                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14361                                  
 14362                                  checklatchio:	
 14363                                  
 14364                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14365                                  			
 14366 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14367 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14368                                  
 14369                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14370                                  
 14371 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14372 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14373                                  
 14374                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14375                                  ; expensive verification.
 14376                                  
 14377 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14378 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14379 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14380 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14381 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14382 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14383 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14384                                  checklatchret:				
 14385 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14386                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14387 00001818 F9                      		stc
 14388 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14389                                  checkret:				
 14390 0000181A C3                      		retn
 14391                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14392                                  
 14393                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14394                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14395                                  ;
 14396                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14397                                  
 14398                                  checkfatvid:				
 14399 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14400 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14401 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14402                                  
 14403                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14404                                  
 14405                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14406                                  
 14407                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14408                                  
 14409                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14410                                  ;
 14411                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14412                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14413                                  ;
 14414                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14415                                  ;
 14416                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14417                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14418                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14419                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14420                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14421                                  ;
 14422                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14423                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14424                                  ; routine.)
 14425                                  ;
 14426                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14427                                  
 14428                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14429                                  check_vid:
 14430                                  
 14431                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14432                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14433                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14434                                  
 14435 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14436                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14437                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14438 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14439 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14440 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14441 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14442 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14443                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14444 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14445                                  					; if not fat system
 14446 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14447 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14448 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14449 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14450                                  					; definitely changed
 14451 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14452                                  
 14453 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14454                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14455 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14456                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14457                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14458                                  		;clc
 14459                                  checkfatret:				
 14460 00001848 C3                      		retn
 14461                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14462                                  
 14463                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14464                                  changed_drv:
 14465 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14466 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14467                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14468 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14470                                  
 14471                                  ; extended id check
 14472                                  
 14473                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14474                                  
 14475                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14476                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14477                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14478                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14479                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14480                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14481                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14482                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14483                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14484                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14485                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14486                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14487                                  ;
 14488                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14489                                  
 14490                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14491                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14492 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14493                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14494                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14495 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14496 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14497 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14498 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14499 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14500 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14501 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14502                                  					; don't know
 14503 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14504 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14505                                  					; reset the flag
 14506                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14507                                  
 14508                                  ext_changed:				
 14509 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14510 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14511                                  					; disk changed!
 14512                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14513                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14514                                  		;clc
 14515 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14516                                  
 14517                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14518                                  
 14519                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14520                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14521                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14522                                  ;
 14523                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14524                                  
 14525                                  checkio:				
 14526 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14527 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14528 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14529 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14530 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14531 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14532 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14533 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14534 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14535 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14536 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14537 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14538                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14539                                  
 14540                                  checkioerr:				
 14541 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14542                                  
 14543                                  checkioret:				
 14544 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14545 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14546                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14547                                  
 14548                                  no_error_map:				
 14549 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14550                                  
 14551                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14552                                  
 14553                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14554                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14555                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14556                                  
 14557                                  returnvid:		
 14558 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14559                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14560 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14561 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14562 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14563 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14564                                  
 14565                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14566                                  
 14567                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14568                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14569                                  ;
 14570                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14571                                  ; **trashes si**
 14572                                  
 14573                                  media_set_vid:				
 14574 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14575                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14576                                  
 14577                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14578                                  
 14579                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14580                                  
 14581                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14582                                  
 14583                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14584                                  vid_into_packet:
 14585 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14586 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14587 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14588 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14589 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14590 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14591 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14592                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14593 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14594                                  
 14595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14596                                  
 14597                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14598                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14599                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14600                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14601                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14602                                  ;
 14603                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14604                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14605                                  ;
 14606                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14607                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14608                                  ;		carry set
 14609                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14610                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14611                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14612                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14613                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14614                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14615                                  ;
 14616                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14617                                  
 14618                                  hidensity:
 14619                                  
 14620                                  ; check for correct drive
 14621                                  		
 14622                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14623 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14624                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14625                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14626 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14627                                  
 14628                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14629                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14630                                  
 14631 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14632 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14633                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14634                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14635 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14636 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14637                                  
 14638                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14639                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14640                                  
 14641 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14642                                  					; ffOther
 14643 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14644 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14645                                  					; ff288
 14646 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14647 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14648 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14649                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14650                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14651 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14652                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14653                                  					; 2 sides
 14654 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14655                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14656                                  					; & head max
 14657 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14658 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14660                                  
 14661                                  Is720K:					
 14662 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14663 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14664                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14665                                  
 14666                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14667                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14668                                  		;retn
 14669                                  
 14670                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14671                                  
 14672                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14673                                  
 14674                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14675                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14676                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14677                                  ;
 14678                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14679                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14680                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14681                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14682                                  ;
 14683                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14684                                  ;
 14685                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14686                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14687                                  
 14688                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14689 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14690 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14691                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14692                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14693 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14694                                  
 14695                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14696                                  
 14697                                  scan_bds:				
 14698 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14699 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14700                                  
 14701                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14702                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14703                                  
 14704 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14705                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14706                                  get_next_bds:				
 14707 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14708                                  					; go to	next bds
 14709 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14710 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14711 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14712 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14713 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14714                                  
 14715                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14716                                  
 14717                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14718                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14719                                  ;
 14720                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14721                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14722                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14723                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14724                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14725                                  
 14726                                  checkromchange:	
 14727                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14728                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14729 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14730                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14731                                  					; fchanged
 14732 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14733                                  
 14734                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14735                                  
 14736                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14737                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14738                                  ;
 14739                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14740                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14741                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14742                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14743                                  
 14744                                  resetchanged:	
 14745                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14746                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14747 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14748                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14749                                  					; ~fchanged
 14750 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14751                                  
 14752                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14753                                  
 14754                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14755                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14756                                  ;
 14757                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14758                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14759                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14760                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14761                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14762                                  
 14763                                  haschange:
 14764                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14765                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14766 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14767                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14768                                  					; fchangeline
 14769 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14770                                  
 14771                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14772                                  
 14773                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14774                                  
 14775                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14776                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14777                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14778                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14779                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14780                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14781                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14782                                  
 14783                                  ; set_volume_id
 14784                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14785                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14786                                  ;
 14787                                  ;   on entry:
 14788                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14789                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14790                                  ;
 14791                                  ;   on exit:
 14792                                  ;	carry clear:
 14793                                  ;	   successful call
 14794                                  ;	carry set
 14795                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14796                                  
 14797                                  set_volume_id:				
 14798 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14799 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14800 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14801 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14802 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14803 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14804 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14805 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14806                                  setvret:				
 14807                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14808                                  		; cf = 0
 14809                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14810 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14811 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14812 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14814                                  
 14815                                  seterr:					
 14816 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14817 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14818 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14819                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14820 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14821                                  
 14822                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14823                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14824                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14825                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14826                                  
 14827                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14828                                  
 14829                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14830                                  
 14831                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14832                                  ;
 14833                                  ;   on entry:
 14834                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14835                                  ;
 14836                                  ;   on exit:
 14837                                  ;	carry clear
 14838                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14839                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14840                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14841                                  ;
 14842                                  ;	carry set:
 14843                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14844                                  
 14845                                  read_volume_id:
 14846 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14847 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14848 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14849 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14850 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14851 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14852 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14853 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14854 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14855 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14856 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14857 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14858 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14859 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14860 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14861                                  					; # of fats
 14862 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14863                                  					; sectors / fat
 14864 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14865 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14866                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14867                                  					;
 14868                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14869                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14870 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14871                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14872                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14873 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14874                                  					; # root dir entries
 14875 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14876 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14877 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14878                                  next_sec:				
 14879 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14880 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14881                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14882                                  					; get sector #
 14883 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14884                                  					; sectors / track
 14885 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14886 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14887                                  
 14888                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14889                                  
 14890 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14891                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14892 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14893 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14894 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14895                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14896 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14897 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14898 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14899                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14900 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14901 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14902 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14903                                  fvid_loop:				
 14904 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14905 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14906 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14907 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14908 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14909 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14910                                  ent_loop:				
 14911 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14912 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14913 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14914 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14915                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14916                                  					; next sector
 14917 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14918                                  notfound:				
 14919 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14920 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14921                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14922                                  
 14923                                  found_vid:				
 14924 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14925 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14926 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14927 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14928 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14929 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14930 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14931 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14932                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14933 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14934 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14935 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14936 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14937 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14938 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14939                                  fvid_ret:				
 14940 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14941                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14942                                  		; cf = 0
 14943                                  		;clc
 14944                                  rvidret:				
 14945 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14946 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14947 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14948 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14949                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14950                                  
 14951                                  no_vid:					
 14952 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14953 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14954                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14955                                  
 14956                                  readviderr:				
 14957 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14958 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14959 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14960                                  
 14961                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14962                                  
 14963                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14964                                  ;
 14965                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14966                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14967                                  
 14968                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14969 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14970 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14971 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14972 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14973                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14974 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14975                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14976 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14977 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14978 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14979 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14980 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14981 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14982 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14983                                  
 14984                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14985                                  
 14986                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14987                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14988                                  ;
 14989                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14990                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14991                                  
 14992                                  check_volume_id:	
 14993 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14994 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14995 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14996                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14997 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14998                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14999 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15000 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 15001 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15002 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 15003 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 15004 000019EA C3                      		retn
 15005                                  
 15006                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15007                                  
 15008                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15009                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15010                                  ;
 15011                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15012                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15013                                  ;
 15014                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15015                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15016                                  ;
 15017                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15018                                  
 15019                                  fat_check:		
 15020 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 15021 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15022 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15023 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15024                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15025 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15026 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 15027                                  okret1:					
 15028 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 15029 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 15030                                  
 15031                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15032                                  
 15033                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15034                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15035                                  
 15036                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15037                                  
 15038                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15039                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15040                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15041                                  
 15042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15043                                  
 15044                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15045                                  		;db 0
 15046                                  
 15047                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15048                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15049                                  
 15050                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15051 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15052                                  %endif
 15053                                  
 15054                                  ;align 16
 15055                                  
 15056                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15057                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15058                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15059                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15060                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15061                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15062                                  
 15063                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15064

 15066                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 15068                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 15111                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15112                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 15113                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15114                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 15115                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 15116                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 15117                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 15118                                  ;
 15119                                  ;
 15120                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 15121                                  ;
 15122                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 15123                                  ;
 15124                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 15125                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15126                                  ;
 15127                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 15128                                  ;
 15129                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 15130                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15131                                  ;
 15132                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 15133                                  ;
 15134                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 15135                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 15136                                  ;value.
 15137                                  ;
 15138                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 15139                                  ;
 15140                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 15141                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 15142                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 15143                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 15144                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 15145                                  ;
 15146                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 15147                                  ;
 15148                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 15149                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 15150                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 15151                                  ;
 15152                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 15153                                  ;
 15154                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15155                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15156                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15157                                  ;
 15158                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15159                                  ;
 15160                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15161                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15162                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15163                                  ;
 15164                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15165                                  ;
 15166                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15167                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15168                                  ;
 15169                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15170                                  ;
 15171                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15172                                  ;
 15173                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15174                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15175                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15176                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15177                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15178                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15179                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15180                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15181                                  ;memory.
 15182                                  ;NOTES:
 15183                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15184                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15185                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15186                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15187                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15188                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15189                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15190                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15191                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15192                                  
 15193                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15194                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15195                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15196                                  
 15197                                  ;include version.inc
 15198                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15199                                  
 15200                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15201                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15202                                  
 15203                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15204                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15205                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15206                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15207                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15208                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15209                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15210                                  
 15211                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15212                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15213                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15214                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15215                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15216                                  
 15217                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15218                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15219                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15220                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15221                                  
 15222                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15223                                  
 15224                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15225                                  				; currently 0.
 15226                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15227                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15228                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15229                                  
 15230                                  ;      if1
 15231                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15232                                  ;      endif
 15233                                  
 15234                                         ;******************************
 15235                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15236                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15237                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15238                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15239                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15240                                         ;******************************
 15241                                  
 15242                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15243                                  ; device definitions
 15244                                  
 15245                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 15246                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 15247                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15248                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15249                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15250                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15251                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15252                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15253                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 15254                                  
 15255                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 15256                                  struc	SYSDEV
 15257 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 15258 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 15259 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 15260 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 15261 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 15262                                  .size:
 15263                                  endstruc
 15264                                  
 15265                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 15266                                  struc	SRHEAD
 15267 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 15268 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 15269 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 15270 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 15271 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 15272                                  .size:
 15273                                  endstruc
 15274                                  
 15275                                  ;Status word masks
 15276                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 15277                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 15278                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 15279                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 15280                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 15281                                  
 15282                                  ;Function codes
 15283                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 15284                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 15285                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 15286                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 15287                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 15288                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 15289                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 15290                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 15291                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 15292                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 15293                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 15294                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 15295                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 15296                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 15297                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 15298                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 15299                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 15300                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 15301                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
 15302                                  DEVWRIOCTL EQU  12              ;IOCTL write
 15303                                  
 15304                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15305                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 15306 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 15307 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 15308 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 15309 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 15310 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 15311 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 15312                                                          ; word
 15313 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 15314 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 15315 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 15316 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 15317                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 15318                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 15319                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 15320                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 15321                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 15322                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 15323                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 15324                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 15325 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 15326 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 15327 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 15328 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 15329 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 15330 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 15331                                  .size:
 15332                                  endstruc

 15334                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15335                                  ; Field definition for I/O buffer information
 15336                                  
 15337                                  ; 22/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, BUFFER.INC, 1991)
 15338                                  
 15339                                  struc buffinfo
 15340 00000000 ????                    .buf_next:	resw 1	; Pointer to next buffer in list
 15341 00000002 ????                    .buf_prev:	resw 1	; Pointer to previous buffer in list
 15342 00000004 ??                      .buf_ID:	resb 1	; Drive of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15343                                  			; SFT table index (bit 7 = 1)
 15344                                  			; = FFh if buffer free
 15345 00000005 ??                      .buf_flags:	resb 1	; Bit 7 = 1 if Remote file buffer
 15346                                  			;	= 0 if Local device buffer
 15347                                  			; Bit 6 = 1 if buffer dirty
 15348                                  			; Bit 5 = Reserved
 15349                                  			; Bit 4 = Search bit (bit 7 = 1)
 15350                                  			; Bit 3 = 1 if buffer is DATA
 15351                                  			; Bit 2 = 1 if buffer is DIR
 15352                                  			; Bit 1 = 1 if buffer is FAT
 15353                                  			; Bit 0 = Reserved
 15354 00000006 ????????                .buf_sector:	resd 1	; Sector number of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15355                                  ; The next two items are often refed as a word (bit 7 = 0)
 15356 0000000A ??                      .buf_wrtcnt:	resb 1	; For FAT sectors, # times sector written out
 15357 0000000B ????                    .buf_wrtcntinc:	resw 1	; "   "     "   , # sectors between each write
 15358 0000000D ????????                .buf_DPB :	resd 1	; Pointer to drive parameters
 15359 00000011 ????                    .buf_fill:	resw 1	; How full buffer is (bit 7 = 1)
 15360 00000013 ??                      .buf_reserved:	resb 1	; make DWORD boundary for 386
 15361                                  .size:
 15362                                  endstruc
 15363                                  
 15364                                  %define buf_offset	dword [buf_sector]
 15365                                  			;For bit 7 = 1, this is the byte
 15366                                  			;offset of the start of the buffer in
 15367                                  			;the file pointed to by buf_ID.  Thus
 15368                                  			;the buffer starts at location
 15369                                  			;buf_offset in the file and contains
 15370                                  			;buf_fill bytes.
 15371                                  
 15372                                  bufinsiz	equ	buffinfo.size ; ; Size of structure in bytes
 15373                                  
 15374                                  
 15375                                  buf_Free	equ	0FFh		; buf_id of free buffer
 15376                                  
 15377                                  ;Flag byte masks
 15378                                  buf_isnet	EQU	10000000B
 15379                                  buf_dirty	EQU	01000000B
 15380                                  ;***
 15381                                  buf_visit	EQU	00100000B
 15382                                  ;***
 15383                                  buf_snbuf	EQU	00010000B
 15384                                  
 15385                                  buf_isDATA	EQU	00001000B
 15386                                  buf_isDIR	EQU	00000100B
 15387                                  buf_isFAT	EQU	00000010B
 15388                                  buf_type_0	EQU	11110001B	; AND sets type to "none"
 15389                                  
 15390                                  buf_NetID	EQU	bufinsiz
