 30434                                  
 30435                                  bf10:	
 30436                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30437                                  	jz	short bf30
 30438                                  
 30439                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30440                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30441                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30442                                  
 30443                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30444                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30445                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30446                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30447                                  
 30448                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30449                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30450                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30451                                  
 30452                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30453                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30454                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30455                                  
 30456                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30457                                  	mov     ax,es
 30458                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30459                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30460                                  	inc     ax
 30461                                  	mov     es,ax
 30462                                  
 30463                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30464                                  
 30465                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30466                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30467                                  	or	bx,bx
 30468                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30469                                  bfE:	
 30470                                  	stc
 30471                                  bfX:
 30472                                  	pop	cx
 30473                                  	pop	bx
 30474                                  	retn
 30475                                  
 30476                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30477                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30478                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30479                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30480                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30481                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30482                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30483                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30484                                  
 30485                                  isSpecified:
 30486                                  	push	ax
 30487                                  
 30488                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30489                                  	mov	bl,al
 30490                                  
 30491                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30492                                  	;
 30493                                  	;push	ds
 30494                                  	;push	cs
 30495                                  	;pop	ds
 30496                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30497                                  	;pop	ds
 30498                                  	
 30499                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30500                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30501                                  
 30502                                  	pop	ax
 30503                                  	retn
 30504                                  
 30505                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30506                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30507                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30508                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30509                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30510                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30511                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30512                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30513                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30514                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30515                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30516                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30517                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30518                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30519                                  
 30520                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30521                                  
 30522                                  shrinkMCB:
 30523                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30524                                  	push	bx
 30525                                  	push	cx
 30526                                  	push	es
 30527                                  
 30528                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30529                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30530                                  
 30531                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30532                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30533                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30534                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30535                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30536                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30537                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30538                                  
 30539                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30540                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30541                                  
 30542                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30543                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30544                                  
 30545                                  	add	ax,bx
 30546                                  	inc	ax
 30547                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30548                                  
 30549                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30550                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30551                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30552                                  	; ax > 0
 30553                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30554                                  
 30555                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30556                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30557                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30558                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30559                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30560                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30561                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30562                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30563                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30564                                  
 30565                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30566                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30567                                  
 30568                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30569                                  	; cf=0
 30570                                  	;clc
 30571                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30572                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30573                                  smE:	
 30574                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30575                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30576                                  	;stc
 30577                                  smX:	
 30578                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30579                                  	pop	es
 30580                                  	pop	cx
 30581                                  	pop	bx
 30582                                  	retn
 30583                                  
 30584                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30585                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30586                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30587                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30588                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30589                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30590                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30591                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30592                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30593                                  ;
 30594                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30595                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30596                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30597                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30598                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30599                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30600                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30601                                  ;       Endif
 30602                                  ;    Endif
 30603                                  ; Endif
 30604                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30605                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30606                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30607                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30608                                  ;    ENDIF
 30609                                  ; ENDIF
 30610                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30611                                  
 30612                                  _hideUMB_:
 30613                                  	push	bx
 30614                                  	push	dx
 30615                                  	push	es
 30616                                  
 30617                                  	mov	al,cl
 30618                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30619                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30620                                  
 30621                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30622                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30623                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30624                                  
 30625                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30626                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30627                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30628                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30629                                  
 30630                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30631                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30632                                  
 30633                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30634                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30635                                  
 30636                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30637                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30638                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30639                                  hu_10:	
 30640                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30641                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30642                                  
 30643                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30644                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30645                                  
 30646                                  	mov	dx,es
 30647                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30648                                  
 30649                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30650                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30651                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30652                                  
 30653                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30654                                  hu_30:	
 30655                                  	mov	al,cl
 30656                                  
 30657                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30658                                  
 30659                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30660                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30661                                  
 30662                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30663                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30664                                  hu_X:	
 30665                                  	pop	es
 30666                                  	pop	dx
 30667                                  	pop	bx
 30668                                  	retn
 30669                                  
 30670                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30671                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30672                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30673                                  ; Entry:  None
 30674                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30675                                  ; Error:  None
 30676                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30677                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30678                                  
 30679                                  UnFreeze:
 30680                                  	push	ax
 30681                                  	push	es
 30682                                  
 30683                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30684                                  	jc	short ufX
 30685                                  
 30686                                  	mov	es,ax
 30687                                  
 30688                                  ; ------------------------------
 30689                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30690                                  ; ------------------------------
 30691                                  
 30692                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30693                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30694                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30695                                  uf20:	
 30696                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30697                                  
 30698                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30699                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30700                                  
 30701                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30702                                  	mov     ax,es
 30703                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30704                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30705                                  	inc     ax
 30706                                  	mov     es,ax
 30707                                  
 30708                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30709                                  ufX:	
 30710                                  	pop	es
 30711                                  	pop	ax
 30712                                  	retn
 30713                                  
 30714                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30715                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30716                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30717                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30718                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30719                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30720                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30721                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30722                                  
 30723                                  isFrozMCB:
 30724                                  	;push	ax
 30725                                  
 30726                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30727                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30728                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30729                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30730                                  
 30731                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30732                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30733                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30734                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30735                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30736                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30737                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30738                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30739                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30740                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30741                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30742                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30743                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30744                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30745                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30746                                  ifmX:	
 30747                                  	;pop	ax
 30748                                  	retn
 30749                                  
 30750                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30751                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30752                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30753                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30754                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30755                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30756                                  ; USES:     None
 30757                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30758                                  
 30759                                  frezMCB:
 30760                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30761                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30762                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30763                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30764                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30765                                  	retn
 30766                                  
 30767                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30768                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30769                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30770                                  ; Entry:  None
 30771                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30772                                  ; Error:  None
 30773                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30774                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30775                                  
 30776                                  FreezeUM:
 30777                                  	push	ax
 30778                                  	push	cx
 30779                                  	push	dx
 30780                                  	push	es
 30781                                  
 30782                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30783                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30784                                  
 30785                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30786                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30787                                  
 30788                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30789                                  	mov	es,ax
 30790                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30791                                  
 30792                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30793                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30794                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30795                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30796                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30797                                  
 30798                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30799                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30800                                  
 30801                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30802                                  fum20:	
 30803                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30804                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30805                                  
 30806                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30807                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30808                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30809                                  
 30810                                  	call	frezMCB
 30811                                  fum30:	
 30812                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30813                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30814                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30815                                  
 30816                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30817                                  	mov     ax,es
 30818                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30819                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30820                                  	inc     ax
 30821                                  	mov     es,ax
 30822                                  	
 30823                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30824                                  
 30825                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30826                                  	pop	dx
 30827                                  	pop	cx
 30828                                  	pop	ax
 30829                                  	retn
 30830                                  
 30831                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30832                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30833                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30834                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30835                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30836                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30837                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30838                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30839                                  
 30840                                  UmbTest:
 30841                                  	push	ax
 30842                                  	push	bx
 30843                                  	push	ds
 30844                                  	push	es
 30845                                  
 30846                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30847                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30848                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30849                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30850                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30851                                  
 30852                                  	pop	es
 30853                                  	pop	ds
 30854                                  	pop	bx
 30855                                  	pop	ax
 30856                                  	retn
 30857                                  
 30858                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30859                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30860                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30861                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30862                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30863                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30864                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30865                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30866                                  
 30867                                  WalkMem:
 30868                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30869                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30870                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30871                                  		   	
 30872                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30873                                  	int	21h
 30874                                  
 30875                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30876                                  	mov	es,ax
 30877                                  
 30878                                  ; ------------------------------
 30879                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30880                                  ; ------------------------------
 30881                                  
 30882                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30883                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30884                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30885                                  
 30886                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30887                                  
 30888                                  	mov     bx,es
 30889                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30890                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30891                                  	inc     bx
 30892                                  	mov     es,bx
 30893                                  		
 30894                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30895                                  um20:	
 30896                                  	mov	ax,es
 30897                                  
 30898                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30899                                  
 30900                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30901                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30902                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30903                                  	retn
 30904                                  
 30905                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30906                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30907                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30908                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30909                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30910                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30911                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30912                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30913                                  
 30914                                  hl_unlink:
 30915                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30916                                  
 30917                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30918                                  	;
 30919                                  	;push	ds
 30920                                  	;push	cs
 30921                                  	;pop	ds
 30922                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30923                                  	;pop	ds
 30924                                  
 30925                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30926                                  
 30927                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30928                                  	int	21h
 30929                                  	retn
 30930                                  
 30931                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30932                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30933                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30934                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30935                                  
 30936                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30937                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30938                                  
 30939                                  ;   Modification log:
 30940                                  ;
 30941                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30942                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30943                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30944                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30945                                  
 30946                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30947                                  
 30948                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30949                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30950                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30951                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30952                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30953                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30954                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30955                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30956                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30957                                  
 30958                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30959                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30960                                  
 30961                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30962                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30963                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30964                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30965                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30966                                  ;    every command execution.
 30967                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30968                                  
 30969                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30970                                  	;
 30971                                  	;push	ds
 30972                                  	;push	cs
 30973                                  	;pop	ds
 30974                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30975                                  	;pop	ds	
 30976                                  
 30977                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30978                                  
 30979                                  	or	al,al
 30980                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30981                                  
 30982                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30983                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30984                                  	retn			; that.
 30985                                  uhu10:	
 30986                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30987                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30988                                  
 30989                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30990                                  	;
 30991                                  	;push	es
 30992                                  	;push	cs
 30993                                  	;pop	es
 30994                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30995                                  	;pop	ds	
 30996                                  
 30997                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30998                                  
 30999                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31000                                  
 31001                                  	pop	ax
 31002                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31003                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31004                                  	retn
 31005                                  
 31006                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31007                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31008                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31009                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31010                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31011                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31012                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31013                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31014                                  
 31015                                  he_unlink:
 31016                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31017                                  
 31018                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31019                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31020                                  
 31021                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31022                                  	int	21h
 31023                                  	retn
 31024                                  
 31025                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31026                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31027                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31028                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31029                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31030                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31031                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31032                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31033                                  
 31034                                  FreeUMBs:
 31035                                  	push	ax
 31036                                  	push	es
 31037                                  
 31038                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31039                                  	jc	short fusX
 31040                                  
 31041                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31042                                  fus10:	
 31043                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31044                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31045                                  	call	freeMCB
 31046                                  fus20:	   
 31047                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31048                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31049                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31050                                  
 31051                                  	mov	ax,es
 31052                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31053                                  	inc	ax
 31054                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31055                                  
 31056                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31057                                  fusX:	
 31058                                  	pop	es
 31059                                  	pop	ax
 31060                                  	retn
 31061                                  
 31062                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31063                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31064                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31065                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31066                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31067                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31068                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31069                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31070                                  
 31071                                  isHideMCB:
 31072                                  	;push	ax
 31073                                  
 31074                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31075                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31076                                  
 31077                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31078                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31079                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31080                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31081                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31082                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31083                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31084                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31085                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31086                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31087                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31088                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31089                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31090                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31091                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31092                                  ihm_x:	
 31093                                  	;pop	ax
 31094                                  	retn
 31095                                  
 31096                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31097                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31098                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31099                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31100                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31101                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31102                                  ; USES:     AX
 31103                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31104                                  
 31105                                  freeMCB:
 31106                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31107                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31108                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31109                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31110                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31111                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31112                                  	retn
 31113                                  
 31114                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31115                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31116                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31117                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31118                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31119                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31120                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31121                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31122                                  
 31123                                  HeadUmb:
 31124                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31125                                  
 31126                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31127                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31128                                  	;push	es
 31129                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31130                                  
 31131                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31132                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31133                                  
 31134                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31135                                  	int	21h
 31136                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS

 31142

 31144                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x

 31147                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31148                                  xhu_x:

 31150                                  	;pop	es	
 31151                                  	;pop	ds ; ?

 31154                                  
 31155                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31156                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31157                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31158                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31159                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31160                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31161                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31162                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31163                                  
 31164                                  linkumb:
 31165                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31166                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31167                                  
 31168                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31169                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31170                                  
 31171                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31172                                  	mov	bx,1
 31173                                  	int	21h
 31174                                  lumbX:
 31175                                  	retn

 31179                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 31182                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31183                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991)

 31185                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31186                                  
 31187                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31188                                  ;
 31189                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31190                                  ;
 31191                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31192                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31193                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31194                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31195                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31196                                  ;
 31197                                  ;	Output : none
 31198                                  ;
 31199                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31200                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31201                                  ;
 31202                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31203                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31204                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31205                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31206                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31208                                  
 31209                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31210                                  InitDevLoad:
 31211                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31212                                  	; ds = cs
 31213 000027DC 803E[CB1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31214                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31215                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31216 000027E1 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31217                                  
 31218                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31219                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31220                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31221                                  ;
 31222                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31223                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31224                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31225                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31226                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31227                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31228                                  ;
 31229                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31230                                  ;
 31231                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31232                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31233                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31234                                  ;	pushf
 31235                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31236                                  ;	popf
 31237                                  ;
 31238                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31239                                  ;
 31240                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31241                                  
 31242                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31243                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31244                                  InitForConv:
 31245                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31246                                  	; ds = cs
 31247 000027E3 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31248                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31249 000027E6 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31250 000027E8 E84D04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31251 000027EB E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31252 000027EE 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31253                                  					;  in low memory
 31254                                  InitForHi:
 31255                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31256                                  	; ds = cs
 31257                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31258                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31259                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31260 000027F0 A1[C11E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31261 000027F3 8B16[BD1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31262 000027F7 0316[BF1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31263 000027FB EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31264                                  
 31265                                  InitForLo:
 31266                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31267                                  	; ds = cs
 31268                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31269 000027FD C606[CB1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31270                                  initforlo_x:
 31271                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31272                                  	; ds = cs
 31273                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31274                                  					;  we are loading low
 31275                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31276                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31277 00002802 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31278 00002805 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31279                                  idl1:
 31280 00002809 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31281                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31282                                  	; ds = cs
 31283                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31284                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31285                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31286                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31287 0000280C A3[B01E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31288 0000280F 8916[B21E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31289 00002813 C706[B41E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31290 00002819 A3[B61E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31291 0000281C C3                      	retn
 31292                                  
 31293                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31294                                  ;
 31295                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31296                                  ;
 31297                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31298                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31299                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31300                                  ;		   current UMB
 31301                                  ;
 31302                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31303                                  
 31304                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31305                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31306                                  	; ds = cs
 31307                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31308                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31309                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31310 0000281D A1[BF1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31311 00002820 0306[BD1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31312 00002824 2B06[C11E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31313                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31314                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31315                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31316                                  	;stc
 31317                                  	;retn
 31318                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31319 00002828 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31320 0000282B 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31321                                  spcinumb1:
 31322 0000282D 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31323                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31324                                  	; ds = cs
 31325 0000282E 3B06[AE1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31326                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31327                                  spcinumb2:
 31328 00002832 C3                      	retn
 31329                                  
 31330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31331                                  ;
 31332                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31333                                  ;
 31334                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31335                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31336                                  ;
 31337                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31338                                  
 31339                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31340                                  ;
 31341                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31342                                  ;	push	ds
 31343                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31344                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31345                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31346                                  ;	pop	ds
 31347                                  ;
 31348                                  ;	inc	ax
 31349                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31350                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31351                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31352                                  ;	retn

 31354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31355                                  ;
 31356                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31357                                  ;
 31358                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31359                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31360                                  ;		 the device.
 31361                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31362                                  ;
 31363                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31364                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31365                                  ;	UMB.
 31366                                  ;
 31367                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31368                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31369                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31370                                  ;
 31371                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31372                                  
 31373                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31374                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31375                                  
 31376                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31377                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31378                                  	; ds = cs
 31379 00002833 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31380 00002836 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31381 00002839 CD21                    	int	21h
 31382                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31383                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31384                                  
 31385 0000283B 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31386 0000283D 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31387                                  
 31388 0000283F 4B                      	dec	bx
 31389                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31390                                  	; ds = cs
 31391 00002840 391E[AE1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31392                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31393 00002844 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31394 00002846 43                      	inc	bx
 31395                                  
 31396 00002847 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31397 0000284A CD21                    	int	21h
 31398 0000284C 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31399                                  
 31400                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31401                                  	;dec	ax
 31402                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31403                                  	;
 31404                                  PrepareMark:
 31405 0000284E 1E                      	push	ds
 31406 0000284F 48                      	dec	ax
 31407 00002850 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31408 00002852 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31409 00002858 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31410 0000285E 40                      	inc	ax
 31411 0000285F 1F                      	pop	ds
 31412                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31413                                  	; ds = cs
 31414                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31415                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31416                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31417 00002860 891E[BF1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31418 00002864 A3[BD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31419 00002867 A3[C11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31420                                  	;
 31421                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31422                                  	; cf=0
 31423                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31424 0000286A C3                      	retn
 31425                                  gufd_err:
 31426 0000286B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31427                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31428                                  	; ds = cs
 31429                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31430                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31431                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31432 0000286D A3[BF1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31433 00002870 A3[BD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31434 00002873 A3[C11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31435 00002876 F9                      	stc
 31436 00002877 C3                      	retn

 31438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31439                                  ;
 31440                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31441                                  ;
 31442                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31443                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31444                                  ;
 31445                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31446                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31447                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31448                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31449                                  ;
 31450                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31451                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31452                                  ;
 31453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31454                                  
 31455                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31456                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31457                                  
 31458                                  DevSetMark:
 31459 00002878 06                      	push	es
 31460 00002879 57                      	push	di
 31461 0000287A 1E                      	push	ds
 31462 0000287B 56                      	push	si
 31463 0000287C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31464 0000287E 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31465 00002884 40                      	inc	ax
 31466 00002885 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31467                                  
 31468                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31469                                  
 31470 00002889 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31471 0000288A 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31472                                  
 31473 0000288F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31474 00002891 FC                      	cld
 31475                                  dsm_again:
 31476 00002892 AC                      	lodsb
 31477 00002893 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31478 00002895 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31479 00002897 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31480 00002899 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31481                                  isit_slash:
 31482 0000289B 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31483 0000289D 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31484 0000289F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31485 000028A1 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31486                                  isit_null:
 31487 000028A3 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31488 000028A5 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31489 000028A7 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31490                                  
 31491 000028A9 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31492 000028AC B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31493                                  dsm_next_char:
 31494 000028AF AC                      	lodsb
 31495 000028B0 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31496 000028B2 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31497 000028B4 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31498 000028B6 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31499 000028B8 AA                      	stosb
 31500 000028B9 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31501                                  blankout:
 31502 000028BB E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31503 000028BD B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31504 000028BF F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31505                                  dsm_exit:
 31506 000028C1 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31507 000028C2 5E                      	pop	si
 31508 000028C3 1F                      	pop	ds
 31509 000028C4 5F                      	pop	di
 31510 000028C5 07                      	pop	es
 31511 000028C6 C3                      	retn

 31513                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31514                                  ;
 31515                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31516                                  ;
 31517                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31518                                  ;
 31519                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31520                                  ;
 31521                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31522                                  ;	in DevSize
 31523                                  ;
 31524                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31525                                  
 31526                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31527                                  SizeDevice:
 31528                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31529                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31530 000028C7 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31531 000028C8 06                      	push	es
 31532 000028C9 1F                      	pop	ds
 31533 000028CA 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31534 000028CC B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31535 000028CF CD21                    	int	21h
 31536 000028D1 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31537                                  
 31538 000028D3 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31539 000028D5 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31540 000028D8 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31541 000028DA 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31542 000028DC CD21                    	int	21h
 31543 000028DE 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31544 000028E0 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31545 000028E3 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31546 000028E6 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31547 000028EA 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31548 000028EC 2EC706[AE1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31549                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31550 000028F3 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31551                                  szdev1:
 31552 000028F5 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31553 000028F7 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31554 000028F9 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31555 000028FB D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31556 000028FD 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31557                                  	;
 31558                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31559 000028FF 2E3B06[CC1E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31560                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31561                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31562 00002904 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31563                                  
 31564 00002906 2EA1[CC1E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31565                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31566 0000290A F8                      	clc
 31567                                  szdev2:
 31568 0000290B 2EA3[AE1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31569                                  
 31570                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31571                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31572                                  	; cf=0
 31573                                  	;clc
 31574                                  sd_close:
 31575 0000290F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31576                                  					;  carry flag
 31577 00002910 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31578 00002913 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31579 00002915 9D                      	popf
 31580                                  sd_err:
 31581                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31582                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31583 00002916 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31584 00002917 C3                      	retn

 31586                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31587                                  ;
 31588                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 31589                                  ;
 31590                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 31591                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 31592                                  ;
 31593                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 31594                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 31595                                  ;
 31596                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 31597                                  ;
 31598                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31599
