 31896                                  ;
 31897                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31898                                  ;
 31899                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31900                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31901                                  ;
 31902                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31903                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31904                                  ;
 31905                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31906                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31907                                  ;
 31908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31909                                  
 31910                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31911                                  
 31912                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31913                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31914                                  GetHexNum:
 31915 000029FB 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31916 000029FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31917                                  ghn_next:
 31918 000029FF 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31919 00002A02 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31920 00002A05 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31921 00002A07 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31922 00002A0A 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31923 00002A0C 50                      	push	ax
 31924 00002A0D 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31925 00002A0F E83306                  	call	delim
 31926 00002A12 58                      	pop	ax
 31927                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31928 00002A13 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31929 00002A16 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31930 00002A18 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31931                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31932                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31933 00002A1B 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31934                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31935                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31936                                  ghn_shift1:
 31937 00002A1D D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31938 00002A1F D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31939 00002A21 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31940 00002A23 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31941 00002A25 46                      	inc	si
 31942 00002A26 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31943                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31944 00002A28 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31945 00002A2B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31946 00002A2E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31947 00002A32 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31948                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31949                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31950                                  ghn_shift2:
 31951 00002A34 F8                      	clc
 31952 00002A35 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31953 00002A37 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31954 00002A39 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31955 00002A3B F8                      	clc
 31956 00002A3C C3                      	retn
 31957                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31958                                  ghn_err:
 31959                                  gnib_err:
 31960 00002A3D F9                      	stc
 31961                                  ghn_ret:
 31962                                  gnib_ret:
 31963 00002A3E C3                      	retn

 32084                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32085                                  ;
 32086                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32087                                  ;
 32088                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32089                                  ;
 32090                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32091                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32092                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32093                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32094                                  ;				NC
 32095                                  ;			  else 
 32096                                  ;				CY
 32097                                  ;
 32098                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32099                                  ;
 32100                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32101                                  
 32102                                  umb_allocate:
 32103                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32104                                  	; ds = cs
 32105 00002A9C 50                      	push	ax
 32106 00002A9D B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32107 00002A9F BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32108                                  					;   possible
 32109                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32110 00002AA2 FF1E[C31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32111                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32112                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32113                                  					; the largest UMB
 32114 00002AA6 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32115 00002AA8 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32116                                  	
 32117 00002AAA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32118                                  
 32119                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32120 00002AAC FF1E[C31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32121                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32122                                  
 32123 00002AB0 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32124                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32125                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32126 00002AB3 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32127                                  ua_err:
 32128 00002AB5 F9                      	stc	
 32129                                  
 32130                                  	;clc
 32131                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32132                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32133                                  	; cf=0
 32134                                  	;clc 
 32135                                  ua_done:
 32136 00002AB6 58                      	pop	ax
 32137 00002AB7 C3                      	retn
 32138                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32139                                  ;ua_err:
 32140                                  	;stc
 32141                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 32142                                  
 32143                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32144                                  ;
 32145                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32146                                  ;
 32147                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32148                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32149                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32150                                  ;			; DS = data
 32151                                  ;
 32152                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32153                                  ;
 32154                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32155                                  ;
 32156                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32157                                  
 32158                                  umb_insert:
 32159 00002AB8 1E                      	push	ds
 32160                                  
 32161                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32162                                  	; ds = cs
 32163                                  
 32164                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32165 00002AB9 8E1E[DA1E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32166                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32167 00002ABD 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32168 00002AC1 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32169 00002AC3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32170                                  ui_next:
 32171 00002AC5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32172                                  					;    new block
 32173 00002AC7 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32174                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32175                                  					;    last
 32176 00002AC9 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32177 00002ACF 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32178                                  					; N: get next block
 32179 00002AD1 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32180                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32181 00002AD3 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32182 00002AD6 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32183                                  
 32184                                  ui_insert:
 32185 00002AD8 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32186 00002ADA 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32187                                  
 32188 00002ADB 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32189 00002ADD F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32190                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32191 00002ADF C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32192                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32193 00002AE4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32194                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32195 00002AEA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32196                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32197 00002AEE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32198                                  
 32199                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32200                                  
 32201 00002AF4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32202 00002AF6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32203 00002AFC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32204                                  					; mark as free
 32205 00002B03 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32206                                  					; start & end of new block
 32207 00002B06 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32208                                  
 32209                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32210                                  	
 32211 00002B0B 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32212 00002B0D 43                      	inc	bx
 32213 00002B0E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32214 00002B10 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32215                                  
 32216                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32217                                  					; this block
 32218 00002B11 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32219                                  	
 32220 00002B13 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32221 00002B19 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32222 00002B20 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32223 00002B24 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32224                                  
 32225 00002B2B EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32226                                  
 32227                                  ui_append:
 32228                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32229 00002B2D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32230 00002B32 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32231                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32232                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32233                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32234 00002B38 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32235                                  
 32236 00002B3E 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32237 00002B40 40                      	inc	ax
 32238 00002B41 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32239                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32240 00002B43 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32241                                  
 32242 00002B45 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32243                                  
 32244 00002B47 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32245 00002B4D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32246 00002B54 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32247 00002B58 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32248                                  
 32249                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32250 00002B5F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32251 00002B61 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32252 00002B67 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32253                                  					; mark as free
 32254 00002B6E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32255 00002B6F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32256                                  ui_done:
 32257                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32258 00002B74 1F                      	pop	ds
 32259                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32260                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32261 00002B75 C3                      	retn
 32262                                  
 32263                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32264                                  
 32265                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32266                                  ;
 32267                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32268                                  ;
 32269                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32270                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32271                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32272                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32273                                  ;
 32274                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32275                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32276                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32277                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32278                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32279                                  ;
 32280                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32281                                  
 32282                                  umb_coalesce:
 32283                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32284                                  	; ds = cs
 32285 00002B76 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32286                                  
 32287 00002B77 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32288                                  
 32289                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32290                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32291 00002B79 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32292 00002B7D 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32293                                  uc_nextfree:
 32294 00002B82 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32295 00002B84 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32296                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32297 00002B86 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32298 00002B8B 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32299                                  					; N: get next arena
 32300 00002B8D E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32301 00002B90 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32302 00002B92 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32303                                  uc_again:
 32304 00002B94 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32305 00002B97 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32306                                  uc_check:
 32307 00002B99 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32308 00002B9E 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32309                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32310 00002BA0 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32311 00002BA5 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32312                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32313 00002BA6 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32314 00002BAA 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32315 00002BAD 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32316 00002BAF EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32317                                  
 32318                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32319                                  ;uc_done:
 32320                                  	;retn
 32321                                  
 32322                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32323                                  ;
 32324                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32325                                  ;
 32326                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32327                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32328                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32329                                  ;
 32330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32331                                  
 32332                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32333                                  get_next:
 32334 00002BB1 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32335 00002BB6 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32336                                  _get_next_:
 32337 00002BB8 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32338 00002BBA 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32339 00002BBE 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32340 00002BBF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32341                                  	;clc
 32342                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32343                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32344                                  	; cf=0
 32345                                  	;clc
 32346 00002BC1 C3                      	retn
 32347                                  gn_err:
 32348 00002BC2 F9                      	stc
 32349                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32350                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32351 00002BC3 C3                      	retn

 32353                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32354                                  ;
 32355                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32356                                  ;
 32357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32358                                  
 32359                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32360                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32361                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32362                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32363                                  	; ds = cs
 32364 00002BC4 E8D5FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32365 00002BC7 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32366                                  
 32367                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32368                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32369                                  
 32370                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32371                                  	; ds = cs
 32372                                  
 32373 00002BC9 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32374 00002BCB B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32375 00002BCD D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32376                                  
 32377 00002BCF 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32378 00002BD1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32379                                  
 32380 00002BD3 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32381                                  
 32382 00002BD5 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32383 00002BD8 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32384                                  	
 32385 00002BDA 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32386 00002BE0 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32387                                  					
 32388 00002BE7 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32389 00002BEB 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32390                                  
 32391                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32392                                  
 32393 00002BF2 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32394 00002BF4 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32395 00002BFA 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32396                                  					; mark as free 
 32397 00002C01 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32398 00002C02 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32399                                  
 32400                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32401                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32402 00002C07 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32403 00002C0B BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32404 00002C0E 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32405                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32406                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32407                                  
 32408                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32409                                  
 32410 00002C11 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32411 00002C14 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32412 00002C17 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32413                                  ;scan_next
 32414                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32415                                  scannext:
 32416 00002C19 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32417 00002C1D 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32418                                  	
 32419 00002C1F 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32420 00002C21 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32421 00002C26 40                      	inc	ax
 32422 00002C27 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32423                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32424                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32425 00002C29 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32426                                  got_last:
 32427 00002C2B 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32428 00002C31 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32429                                  	;clc
 32430                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32431                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32432                                  	; cf=0
 32433                                  	;clc
 32434 00002C37 C3                      	retn
 32435                                  
 32436                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32437                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32438                                  ;	;stc
 32439                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32440                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32441                                  ;	; cf=1
 32442                                  ;	;stc
 32443                                  ;	retn
 32444                                  
 32445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32446                                  ;
 32447                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32448                                  ;
 32449                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32450                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32451                                  ;
 32452                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32453                                  
 32454                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32455                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32456                                  	; ds = cs
 32457 00002C38 833E[BD1E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32458                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32459 00002C3D 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32460 00002C3F 06                      	push	es
 32461 00002C40 53                      	push	bx
 32462                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32463                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32464                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32465                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32466 00002C41 8B1E[C11E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32467 00002C45 2B1E[BD1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32468 00002C49 8E06[BD1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32469                                  	
 32470 00002C4D B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32471 00002C50 CD21                    	int	21h
 32472                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32473                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32474                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32475 00002C52 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32476 00002C54 48                      	dec	ax
 32477 00002C55 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32478 00002C57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32479 00002C5E 5B                      	pop	bx
 32480 00002C5F 07                      	pop	es
 32481                                  su_exit:
 32482 00002C60 C3                      	retn

 32495 00002C61 1E                      	push	ds

 32497                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32498 00002C63 803E[D91E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32499                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32500 00002C68 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32501                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32502 00002C6A 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32503                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32504 00002C6E 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32505 00002C73 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32506                                  ulu_next:
 32507 00002C78 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32508 00002C7B 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32509 00002C7D 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32510 00002C7F 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32511 00002C81 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32512 00002C83 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32513                                  ulu_found:
 32514                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32515 00002C85 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32516                                  ulu_x:
 32517 00002C8A 07                      	pop	es
 32518 00002C8B 1F                      	pop	ds
 32519 00002C8C C3                      	retn

 32521                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32522                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32523                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32524                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32525                                  
 32526                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32527                                  ;
 32528                                  ; Summary:
 32529                                  ;
 32530                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32531                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32532                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32533                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32534                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32535                                  ;
 32536                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32537                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32538                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32539                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32540                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32541                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32542                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32543                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32544                                  ;
 32545                                  ; Example:
 32546                                  ;
 32547                                  ;   [menu]
 32548                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32549                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32550                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32551                                  ;
 32552                                  ;   [network]
 32553                                  ;   include misc
 32554                                  ;   device=foo
 32555                                  ;
 32556                                  ;   [misc]
 32557                                  ;   device=bar
 32558                                  ;   include alternate
 32559                                  ;
 32560                                  ;   [alternate]
 32561                                  ;   device=tar
 32562                                  ;
 32563                                  ;
 32564                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32565                                  ;
 32566                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32567                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32568                                  ;
 32569                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32570                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32571                                  ;   following order:
 32572                                  ;
 32573                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32574                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32575                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32576                                  ;
 32577                                  
 32578                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32579                                  
 32580                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32581                                  
 32582                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32583                                  
 32584                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32585                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32586                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32587                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32588                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32589                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32590                                  
 32591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32592                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32593                                  
 32594                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32595                                  
 32596                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32597                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32598                                  
 32599 00002C8D 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32600                                  
 32601                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32602                                  ;
 32603                                  ; procedure : setparms
 32604                                  ;
 32605                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 32606                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 32607                                  ;
 32608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32609                                  
 32610                                  setparms:
 32611 00002C8E 1E                      	push	ds
 32612 00002C8F 50                      	push	ax
 32613 00002C90 53                      	push	bx
 32614 00002C91 51                      	push	cx
 32615 00002C92 52                      	push	dx
 32616                                  
 32617 00002C93 0E                      	push	cs
 32618 00002C94 1F                      	pop	ds
 32619                                  
 32620 00002C95 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx

 32770                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32771                                  	; 12/12/2022

 32787                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32788                                  ;
 32789                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32790                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32791                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32792                                  ; error.
 32793                                  ;
 32794                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32801 00002CE8 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32802                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32803 00002CEA 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 32808

 32815 00002CFC F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32816                                  
 32817 00002CFE 07                      	pop	es
 32818 00002CFF 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32819

 32821 00002D04 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32822 00002D06 8B1E[5736]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32823 00002D0A 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32824 00002D0C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32825                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33045                                  ;
 33046                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33047                                  ;
 33048                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33049                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33050                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33051                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33052                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33053                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33054                                  ;
 33055                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33056                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33057                                  ;
 33058                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33059                                  ;
 33060                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33061                                  
 33062                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33063                                  
 33064                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33065                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33066                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33067                                  	; ds = cs
 33068                                  	
 33069 00002DA9 06                      	push	es
 33070                                  
 33071 00002DAA 0E                      	push	cs
 33072 00002DAB 07                      	pop	es
 33073                                  
 33074 00002DAC 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33075 00002DAE 8A1E[2F35]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33076 00002DB2 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33077 00002DB5 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33078                                  
 33079 00002DB7 C706[3235]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33080                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33081                                  got_80:
 33082 00002DBD D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 33083 00002DBF 8BB7[D636]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 33084                                  
 33085                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 33086                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33087 00002DC3 BF[3535]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 33088 00002DC6 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 33100

 33102                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 33103 00002DD7 A3[4235]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax

 33112                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax

 33144

 33146                                  
 33147                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33148                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33149                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33150                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33151                                  
 33152                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33153                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33154                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33155

 33159 00002E09 7502                    	jne	short not_144m

 33162

 33559 00002F81 AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 33560 00002F82 EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 33561                                  
 33562                                  end_copy_file:
 33563 00002F84 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 33564 00002F89 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 33565 00002F8B 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33566 00002F8D EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 33567                                  
 33568                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 33569 00002F8F E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 33570 00002F92 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33571                                  
 33572 00002F94 E86200                  	call	get2
 33573 00002F97 E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 33574 00002F9A 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 33575 00002F9C EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 33576                                  
 33577                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 33578 00002F9E E86E00                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 33579 00002FA1 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33580 00002FA3 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 33581                                  
 33582                                  org51:
 33583 00002FA6 AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 33584 00002FA7 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 33585 00002FA9 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 33586 00002FAB 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 33587 00002FAD 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 33588                                  					; M051 - Start
 33589                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33590                                  	; ds = cs
 33591 00002FAF 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 33592                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 33593 00002FB4 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 33594 00002FB6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 33595 00002FB8 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 33596 00002FBA 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 33597 00002FBC 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 33598 00002FBE 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 33599 00002FC3 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 33600 00002FC4 FE06[8D2C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 33601                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 33602                                  					; inserted
 33603 00002FC8 EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 33604                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 33605                                  
 33606 00002FCA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 33607 00002FCC 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 33608 00002FCE EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 33609                                  
 33610                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 33611                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33612                                  	; ds = cs
 33613 00002FD0 803E[8D2C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 33614                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 33615 00002FD5 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 33616 00002FD7 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 33617 00002FDC AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 33618                                  					; M051 - End
 33619                                  org1_brdg:
 33620 00002FDD C606[8D2C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 33621                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 33622                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 33623 00002FE2 E976FE                  	jmp	org1
 33624                                  
 33625                                  at_quote:
 33626 00002FE5 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33627                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 33628 00002FEA 7407                    	je	short up_level
 33629                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 33630 00002FEC C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 33631 00002FF1 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 33632                                  
 33633                                  up_level:
 33634                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 33635 00002FF3 FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 33636 00002FF7 EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 33637                                  
 33638                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33639                                  ;
 33640                                  ; procedure : get2
 33641                                  ;
 33642                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33643                                  
 33644                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33645                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 33646                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33647                                  get2:
 33648 00002FF9 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 33649                                  	;
 33650                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33651                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 33652                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33653 00002FFB 26                      	es	
 33654 00002FFC AC                      	lodsb
 33655                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 33656                                  	;inc	si
 33657                                  	;
 33658 00002FFD 49                      	dec	cx
 33659 00002FFE C3                      	retn
 33660                                  noget:
 33661 00002FFF 59                      	pop	cx
 33662                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33663                                  	; ds = cs
 33664                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 33665                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 33666 00003000 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 33667 00003004 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 33668 00003008 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33669                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 33670 0000300A 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 33671                                  
 33672                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33673                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 33674                                  ;;	retn
 33675                                  ;;else
 33676                                  ;
 33677                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 33678                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 33679                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 33680                                  ;
 33681                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 33682                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 33683                                  ;;endif
 33684                                  
 33685                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33686 0000300E C3                      	retn
 33687                                  
 33688                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33689                                  ;
 33690                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33691                                  ;
 33692                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33693                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33694                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33695                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33696                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33697                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33698                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33699                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33700                                  ;
 33701                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33702                                  
 33703                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33704                                  
 33705                                  skip_comment:
 33706 0000300F E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33707                                  
 33708                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33709                                  	; ds = cs	
 33710                                  
 33711 00003011 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33712                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33713 00003016 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33714                                  
 33715 00003018 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33716                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33717 0000301D 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33718                                  
 33719 0000301F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33720                                  	
 33721 00003022 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33722                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33723 00003026 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33724                                  
 33725 00003028 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33726                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33727 0000302D 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33728                                  
 33729 0000302F 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33730                                  	
 33731 00003033 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33732                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33733 00003037 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33734                                  skip_cmmt:
 33735 00003039 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33736 0000303B 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33737 0000303E 46                      	inc	si
 33738 0000303F 49                      	dec	cx
 33739 00003040 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33740 00003042 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33741                                  no_commt:
 33742 00003044 C3                      	retn
 33743                                  
 33744                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33745                                  %if 0
 33746                                  
 33747                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33748                                  
 33749                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33750                                  ;
 33751                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33752                                  ;
 33753                                  ;   INPUT
 33754                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33755                                  ;
 33756                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33757                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33758                                  ;
 33759                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33760                                  ;       All
 33761                                  ;
 33762                                  ;   HISTORY
 33763                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33764                                  ;
 33765                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33766                                  
 33767                                  kbd_read:
 33768                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33769                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33770                                  
 33771                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33772                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33773                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33774                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33775                                  kbd_loop:
 33776                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33777                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33778                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33779                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33780                                          int     16h             ;
 33781                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33782                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33783                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33784                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33785                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33786                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33787                                  
 33788                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33789                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33790                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33791                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33792                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33793                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33794                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33795                                          int     16h             ;
 33796                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33797                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33798                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33799                                          inc     bx
 33800                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33801                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33802                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33803                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33804                                          int     16h             ;
 33805                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33806                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33807                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33808                                  
 33809                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33810                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33811                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33812                                  	
 33813                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33814                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33815                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33816                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33817                                          call    print
 33818                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33819                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33820                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33821                                  kbd_notf5:
 33822                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33823                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33824                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33825                                  
 33826                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33827                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33828                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33829                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33830                                          call    print           ;
 33831                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33832                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33833                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33834                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33835                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33836                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33837                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33838                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33839                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33840                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33841                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33842                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33843                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33844                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33845                                          retn			;
 33846                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33847                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33848                                          retn			;
 33849                                  
 33850                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33851                                  ;
 33852                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33853                                  ;
 33854                                  ;   INPUT
 33855                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33856                                  ;
 33857                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33858                                  ;       None
 33859                                  ;
 33860                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33861                                  ;       None
 33862                                  ;
 33863                                  ;   HISTORY
 33864                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33865                                  ;
 33866                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33867                                  
 33868                                  set_numlock:
 33869                                          push    ax
 33870                                          push    ds
 33871                                          sub     ax,ax
 33872                                          mov     ds,ax
 33873                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33874                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33875                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33876                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33877                                          jmp     short set_done
 33878                                  not_off:
 33879                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33880                                          stc
 33881                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33882                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33883                                  set_done:
 33884                                          pop     ds
 33885                                          pop     ax
 33886                                          retn
 33887                                  
 33888                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33889                                  
 33890                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33891                                  ;
 33892                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33893                                  ;
 33894                                  ;   INPUT
 33895                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33896                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33897                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33898                                  ;
 33899                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33900                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33901                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33902                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33903                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33904                                  ;
 33905                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33906                                  ;       All
 33907                                  ;
 33908                                  ;   NOTES
 33909                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33910                                  ;
 33911                                  ;   HISTORY
 33912                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33913                                  ;
 33914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33915                                  
 33916                                  menu_check:
 33917                                  
 33918                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33919                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33920                                  
 33921                                          push    cx              ;
 33922                                          push    si              ;
 33923                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33924                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33925                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33926                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33927                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33928                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33929                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33930                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33931                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33932                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33933                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33934                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33935                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33936                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33937                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33938                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33939                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33940                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33941                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33942                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33943                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33944                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33945                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33946                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33947                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33948                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33949                                          call    get_char        ;
 33950                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33951                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33952                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33953                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33954                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33955                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33956                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33957                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33958                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33959                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33960                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33961                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33962                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33963                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33964                                          pop     si              ;
 33965                                          pop     cx              ;
 33966                                  
 33967                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33968                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33969                                  
 33970                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33971                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33972                                  ;
 33973                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33974                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33975                                  ;
 33976                                          call    kbd_read
 33977                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33978                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33979                                  
 33980                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33981                                  
 33982                                  menu_search:
 33983                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33984                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33985                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33986                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33987                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33988                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33989                                  
 33990                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33991                                  
 33992                                  menu_color:
 33993                                          push    cx              ;
 33994                                          push    dx              ;
 33995                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33996                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33997                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33998                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33999                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34000                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34001                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34002                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34003                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34004                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34005                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34006                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34007                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34008                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 34009                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34010                                  check_color:                    ;
 34011                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34012                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 34013                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34014                                  set_color:
 34015                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34016                                          pop     dx              ;
 34017                                          pop     cx              ;
 34018                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34019                                  
 34020                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34021                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34022                                  
 34023                                  menu_found:
 34024                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34025                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34026                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34027                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34028                                  
 34029                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34030                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34031                                  
 34032                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34033                                  
 34034                                  menu_process:
 34035                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34036                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34037                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34038                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34039                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34040                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34041                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34042                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34043                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34044                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34045                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34046                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34047                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34048                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34049                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 34050                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34051                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34052                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34053                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34054                                          stc                     ;
 34055                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34056                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34057                                  menu_numlock:
 34058                                          call    set_numlock
 34059                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34060                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34061                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34062                                  
 34063                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34064
