 35095                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35096                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35097                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35098                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35099                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35100                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35101                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35102                                  print1: 
 35103                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35104                                  print2: 
 35105                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35106                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35107                                  to_input_key:
 35108                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35109                                  not_down:
 35110                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35111                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35112                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35113                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35114                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35115                                          call    show_status     ;
 35116                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35117                                  not_f8:
 35118                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35119                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35120                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35121                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35122                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35123                                  
 35124                                  normal_key:
 35125                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35126                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35127                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35128                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35129                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35130                                          retn			;
 35131                                  not_backspace:
 35132                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35133                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35134                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35135                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35136                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35137                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35138                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35139                                          jmp	short print2
 35140                                  
 35141                                  select_done:
 35142                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35143                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35144                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35145                                  
 35146                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35147                                  
 35148                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35149                                  
 35150                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35151                                  ;
 35152                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35153                                  ;
 35154                                  ;   INPUT
 35155                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35156                                  ;
 35157                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35158                                  ;       None
 35159                                  ;
 35160                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35161                                  ;       None
 35162                                  ;
 35163                                  ;   NOTES
 35164                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35165                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35166                                  ;
 35167                                  ;   HISTORY
 35168                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35169                                  ;
 35170                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35171                                  
 35172                                  disp_input:
 35173                                          push    ax
 35174                                          cmp     al,' '
 35175                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35176                                          mov     al,' '
 35177                                  disp_ok:
 35178                                          mov     dl,al
 35179                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35180                                          int     21h
 35181                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35182                                          call    print
 35183                                          pop     ax
 35184                                          retn
 35185                                  
 35186                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35187                                  
 35188                                  disp_num:
 35189                                          push    bx
 35190                                          add     al,'0'
 35191                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35192                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35193                                          mov     cx,1
 35194                                          int     10h
 35195                                          pop     bx
 35196                                          retn
 35197                                  
 35198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35199                                  ;
 35200                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35201                                  ;
 35202                                  ;   INPUT
 35203                                  ;       None
 35204                                  ;
 35205                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35206                                  ;       None
 35207                                  ;
 35208                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35209                                  ;       None
 35210                                  ;
 35211                                  ;   NOTES
 35212                                  ;       None
 35213                                  ;
 35214                                  ;   HISTORY
 35215                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35216                                  ;
 35217                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35218                                  
 35219                                  show_status:
 35220                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35221                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35222                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35223                                          int     10h             ;
 35224                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35225                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35226                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35227                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35228                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35229                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35230                                          int     10h             ;
 35231                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35232                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35233                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35234                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35235                                  show_onoff: 
 35236                                          int     10h
 35237                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35238                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35239                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35240                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35241                                  
 35242                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35243                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35244                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35245                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35246                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35247                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35248                                          int     10h             ;
 35249                                  show_done:                      ;
 35250                                          pop     dx              ;
 35251                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35252                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35253                                          pop     bx              ;
 35254                                          retn			;
 35255                                  
 35256                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35257                                  
 35258                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35259                                  ;
 35260                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35261                                  ;
 35262                                  ;   INPUT
 35263                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35264                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35265                                  ;
 35266                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35267                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35268                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35269                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35270                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35271                                  ;
 35272                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35273                                  ;       AX
 35274                                  ;
 35275                                  ;   NOTES
 35276                                  ;       None
 35277                                  ;
 35278                                  ;   HISTORY
 35279                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35280                                  ;
 35281                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35282                                  
 35283                                  skip_token:
 35284                                          call    get_char
 35285                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35286                                          call    any_delim
 35287                                          jne	short skip_token
 35288                                  skip_check_eol:
 35289                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35290                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35291                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35292                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35293                                          clc
 35294                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35295                                  	retn
 35296                                  skip_token_eol:
 35297                                          stc
 35298                                  skip_token_done:
 35299                                          retn
 35300                                  
 35301                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35302                                  ;
 35303                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35304                                  ;
 35305                                  ;   INPUT
 35306                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35307                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35308                                  ;
 35309                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35310                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35311                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35312                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35313                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35314                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35315                                  ;
 35316                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35317                                  ;       AX
 35318                                  ;
 35319                                  ;   NOTES
 35320                                  ;       None
 35321                                  ;
 35322                                  ;   HISTORY
 35323                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35324                                  ;
 35325                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35326                                  
 35327                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35328                                          call    get_char        ;
 35329                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35330                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35331                                          call    delim           ;
 35332                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35333                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35334                                  
 35335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35336                                  ;
 35337                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35338                                  ;
 35339                                  ;   INPUT
 35340                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35341                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35342                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35343                                  ;
 35344                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35345                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35346                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35347                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35348                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35349                                  ;
 35350                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35351                                  ;       AX
 35352                                  ;
 35353                                  ;   NOTES
 35354                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35355                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35356                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35357                                  ;
 35358                                  ;   HISTORY
 35359                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35360                                  ;
 35361                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35362                                  
 35363                                  skip_opt_line:
 35364                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35365                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35366                                       
 35367                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35368                                  
 35369                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35370                                  ;
 35371                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35372                                  ;
 35373                                  ;   INPUT
 35374                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35375                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35376                                  ;
 35377                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35378                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35379                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35380                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35381                                  ;
 35382                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35383                                  ;       AX
 35384                                  ;
 35385                                  ;   NOTES
 35386                                  ;       None
 35387                                  ;
 35388                                  ;   HISTORY
 35389                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35390                                  ;
 35391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35392                                  
 35393                                  skip_line:
 35394                                          call    get_char
 35395                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35396                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35397                                          jne	short skip_line
 35398                                  skip_line_done:
 35399                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35400                                          retn
 35401                                  
 35402                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35403                                  ;
 35404                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35405                                  ;
 35406                                  ;   INPUT
 35407                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35408                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35409                                  ;
 35410                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35411                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35412                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35413                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35414                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35415                                  ;
 35416                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35417                                  ;       AX
 35418                                  ;
 35419                                  ;   NOTES
 35420                                  ;       None
 35421                                  ;
 35422                                  ;   HISTORY
 35423                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35424                                  ;
 35425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35426                                  
 35427                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35428                                  
 35429                                  get_number:
 35430                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35431                                  num_loop:
 35432                                          call    get_char        ;
 35433                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35434                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35435                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35436                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35437                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35438                                          push    ax              ;
 35439                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35440                                          push    dx              ;
 35441                                          mul     bx              ;
 35442                                          pop     dx              ;
 35443                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35444                                          pop     ax              ;
 35445                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35446                                          cbw                     ;
 35447                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35448                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35449                                  
 35450                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35451                                  ;num_done:
 35452                                          ;retn
 35453                                  
 35454                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35455                                  ;
 35456                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35457                                  ;
 35458                                  ;   INPUT
 35459                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35460                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35461                                  ;
 35462                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35463                                  ;       AL == next character
 35464                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35465                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35466                                  ;
 35467                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35468                                  ;       AX
 35469                                  ;
 35470                                  ;   NOTES
 35471                                  ;       None
 35472                                  ;
 35473                                  ;   HISTORY
 35474                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35475                                  ;
 35476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35477                                  
 35478                                  get_char:
 35479                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35480                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35481                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35482                                  	es	
 35483                                  	lodsb
 35484                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35485                                          retn			;
 35486                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35487                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35488                                  nearby_ret:
 35489                                          retn
 35490                                  
 35491                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35492                                  ;
 35493                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35494                                  ;
 35495                                  ;   INPUT
 35496                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35497                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35498                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35499                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35500                                  ;
 35501                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35502                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35503                                  ;
 35504                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35505                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35506                                  ;
 35507                                  ;   NOTES
 35508                                  ;       None
 35509                                  ;
 35510                                  ;   HISTORY
 35511                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35512                                  ;
 35513                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35514                                  
 35515                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35516                                  query_user:
 35517                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35518                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35519                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35520                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35521                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35522                                  qu_1:
 35523                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35524                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35525                                          push    ax                      ;
 35526                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35527                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35528                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35529                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35530                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35531                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35532                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35533                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35534                                  query_all:
 35535                                  
 35536                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35537                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35538                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35539                                  
 35540                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35541                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35542                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35543                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35544                                  
 35545                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35546                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35547                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35548                                  find_match:                             ;
 35549                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35550                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35551                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35552                                          inc     di                      ;
 35553                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35554                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35555                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35556                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35557                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35558                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35559                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35560                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35561                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35562                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35563                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35564                                          inc     di                      ;
 35565                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35566                                          int     21h                     ;
 35567                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35568                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35569                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35570                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35571                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35572                                  cmd_notset:
 35573                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35574                                  line_print:                             ;
 35575                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35576                                          es
 35577                                  	lodsb
 35578                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35579                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35580                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35581                                  non_null:                               ;
 35582                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35583                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35584                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35585                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35586                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35587                                  non_space:                              ;
 35588                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35589                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35590                                          int     21h                     ;
 35591                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35592                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35593                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35594                                  
 35595                                  generic_prompt:
 35596                                          call    print                   ;
 35597                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35598                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35599                                          int     16h                     ;
 35600                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35601                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35602                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35603                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35604                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35605                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35606                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35607                                  not_func:
 35608                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35609                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35610                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35611                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35612                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35613                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35614                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35615                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35616                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35617                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35618                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35619                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35620                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35621                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35622                                  
 35623                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35624                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35625                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35626                                  	clc
 35627                                  do_cmd:
 35628                                  	pop     ax			;
 35629                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35630                                  	; cf=0
 35631                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35632                                  	retn
 35633                                  
 35634                                  skip_cmd:
 35635                                  	pop     ax			;
 35636                                  skip_all:
 35637                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35638                                  	stc
 35639                                  	retn
 35640                                  
 35641                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35642                                  ;
 35643                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35644                                  ;
 35645                                  ;   INPUT
 35646                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35647                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35648                                  ;
 35649                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35650                                  ;       None
 35651                                  ;
 35652                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35653                                  ;       None
 35654                                  ;
 35655                                  ;   NOTES
 35656                                  ;       None
 35657                                  ;
 35658                                  ;   HISTORY
 35659                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35660                                  ;
 35661                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35662                                  
 35663                                  print_error:
 35664                                          push    ax
 35665                                          push    bx
 35666                                          push    cx
 35667                                          push    dx
 35668                                          push    ds
 35669                                          push    cs
 35670                                          pop     ds
 35671                                          pushf
 35672                                          call    get_linenum
 35673                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35674                                          call    error_line
 35675                                          popf
 35676                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35677                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35678                                          call    print
 35679                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35680                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35681                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35682                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35683                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35684                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35685                                  pe_1:     
 35686                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35687                                          call    print
 35688                                  pe_ret: 
 35689                                  	pop     ds
 35690                                          pop     dx
 35691                                          pop     cx
 35692                                          pop     bx
 35693                                          pop     ax
 35694                                  	retn
 35695                                  
 35696                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35697                                  
 35698                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35699                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35700                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35701                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35702                                  
 35703                                  disable_autoexec:
 35704                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35705                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35706                                  
 35707                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35708                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35709                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35710                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35711                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35712                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35713                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35714                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35715                                  dae_1:
 35716                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35717                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35718                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35719                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35720                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35721                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35722                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35723                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35724                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35725                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35726                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35727                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35728                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35729                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35730                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35731                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35732                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35733                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35734                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35735                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35736                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35737                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35738                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35739                                          retn
 35740                                  
 35741                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35742                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35743                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35744                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35745                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35746                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35747                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35748                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35749                                  
 35750                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35751                                  
 35752                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35753                                  
 35754                                  
 35755                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35756                                  
 35757                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35758                                  ;
 35759                                  ; procedure : delim
 35760                                  ;
 35761                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35762                                  
 35763                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35764                                  ;
 35765                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35766                                  ;
 35767                                  ;any_delim:
 35768                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35769                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35770                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35771                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35772                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35773                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35774                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35775                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35776                                  ;
 35777                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35778                                  
 35779                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35780                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35781                                  delim:
 35782 00003045 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35783 00003047 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35784                                  
 35785 00003049 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35786 0000304B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35787                                  
 35788                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35789 0000304D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35790 0000304F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35791 00003051 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35792 00003053 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35793 00003055 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35794 00003057 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35795 00003059 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35796 0000305B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35797 0000305D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35798                                  
 35799                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35800                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35801                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35802                                  ;	clc
 35803                                  ;;endif
 35804                                  
 35805                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35806                                  delim_ret:
 35807 0000305F C3                      	retn
 35808                                  
 35809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35810                                  ;
 35811                                  ; procedure : newline
 35812                                  ;
 35813                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 35814                                  ;
 35815                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35816                                  
 35817                                  newline:
 35818 00003060 E89CF6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35819 00003063 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret
 35820 00003065 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 35821 00003067 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35822 00003069 E893F6                  	call	getchr
 35823                                  nl_ret:
 35824 0000306C C3                      	retn

 35828                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35829                                  ;
 35830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35831                                  
 35832                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35833                                  mapcase:
 35834 0000306D 51                      	push	cx
 35835 0000306E 56                      	push	si
 35836 0000306F 1E                      	push	ds
 35837                                  
 35838 00003070 06                      	push	es
 35839 00003071 1F                      	pop	ds
 35840                                  
 35841                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35842                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35843                                  ;
 35844                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35845                                  ;;else
 35846                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35847                                  ;;endif
 35848                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35849 00003072 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35850                                  
 35851                                  convloop:
 35852 00003074 AC                      	lodsb
 35853 00003075 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35854 00003077 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35855 00003079 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35856 0000307B 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35857 0000307D 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35858 0000307F 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35859                                  noconv:
 35860                                  
 35861                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35862                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35863                                  ;;
 35864                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35865                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35866                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35867                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35868                                  ;;
 35869                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35870                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35871                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35872                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35873                                  ;check_eol:
 35874                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35875                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35876                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35877                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35878                                  ;;endif
 35879                                  	
 35880                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35881 00003082 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35882                                  convdone:
 35883 00003084 1F                      	pop	ds
 35884 00003085 5E                      	pop	si
 35885 00003086 59                      	pop	cx
 35886 00003087 C3                      	retn
 35887                                  
 35888                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35889                                  ;
 35890                                  ; procedure : round
 35891                                  ;
 35892                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35893                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35894                                  ;
 35895                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35896                                  
 35897                                  round:
 35898 00003088 50                      	push	ax
 35899 00003089 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35900                                  
 35901 0000308D E830E0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35902                                  
 35903 00003090 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35904 00003095 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35905 0000309C 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35906 000030A0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35907 000030A5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35908 000030A7 2EF606[3414]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35909 000030AD 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35910 000030AF 06                      	push	es
 35911 000030B0 56                      	push	si
 35912 000030B1 2E8B36[3214]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35913 000030B6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35914 000030B8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35915 000030BA 48                      	dec	ax
 35916                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35917 000030BB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35918 000030BF 2E8026[3414]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35919 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 35920 000030C6 07                      	pop	es
 35921                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35922 000030C7 58                      	pop	ax
 35923                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35924                                  	; cf = 0
 35925                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35926                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35927 000030C8 C3                      	retn
 35928                                  
 35929                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35930                                  
 35931                                  mem_err:
 35932                                  	; 11/12/2022

 35934 000030CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 35935                                  mem_err2:
 35936 000030CB BA[F137]                	mov	dx,badmem

 35939 000030CE E87602                  	call	print
 35940 000030D1 E97FD7                  	jmp	stall

 35948                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35949                                  	; (SYSINIT:34E0h)
 35950                                  calldev:
 35951 000030D4 2E8E1E[B61E]            	mov	ds,[cs:DevEntry+2]
 35952 000030D9 2E031E[B41E]            	add	bx,[cs:DevEntry]	; do a little relocation
 35953 000030DE 8B07                    	mov	ax,[bx]
 35954                                  
 35955 000030E0 2EFF36[B41E]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]

 35957 000030E9 BB[E603]                	mov	bx,packet
 35958 000030EC 2EFF1E[B41E]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]
 35959 000030F1 2E8F06[B41E]            	pop	word [cs:DevEntry]
 35960 000030F6 C3                      	retn

 35964                                  ; procedure : todigit
 35965                                  ;
 35966                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35967                                  
 35968                                  todigit:
 35969 000030F7 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 35970                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 35971                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35972 000030F9 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 35973                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35974                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35975                                  	;clc
 35976                                  	;retn
 35977                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35978 000030FB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 35979 000030FD F5                      	cmc
 35980                                  notdig:
 35981                                  	;stc
 35982                                  notdig2:
 35983 000030FE C3                      	retn
 35984                                  
 35985                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35986                                  ;
 35987                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35988                                  ;
 35989                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35990                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35991                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35992                                  ;
 35993                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35994                                  
 35995                                  getnum:
 35996 000030FF 53                      	push	bx
 35997 00003100 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35998                                  b2:
 35999 00003102 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36000 00003105 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36001                                  
 36002 00003107 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36003 00003108 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36004                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36005                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36006 00003109 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36007 0000310B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36008 0000310D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36009 0000310E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36010 00003110 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36011 00003113 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36012                                  
 36013 00003115 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36014                                  
 36015 00003116 E8E6F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36016 00003119 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36017 0000311B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36018 0000311D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36019 0000311F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36020 00003121 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36021 00003123 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36022 00003125 7417                    	je	short b15
 36023 00003127 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36024 0000312C 7410                    	je	short b15
 36025 0000312E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36026                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36027                                  	;nop
 36028                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36029                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36030                                  	;nop
 36031                                  	;nop
 36032 00003130 740C                    	je	short b15
 36033 00003132 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36034 00003134 7408                    	je	short b15
 36035 00003136 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36036 00003138 7404                    	je	short b15
 36037 0000313A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36038 0000313C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36039                                  b15:
 36040 0000313E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36041 00003143 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36042                                  b1:
 36043 00003148 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36044 0000314A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36045 0000314C 5B                      	pop	bx
 36046 0000314D C3                      	retn
 36047                                  badnum:
 36048                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36049                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36050 0000314E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36051                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36052 00003150 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36053 00003154 5B                      	pop	bx
 36054 00003155 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36055 00003156 C3                      	retn
 36056                                  
 36057                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36058                                  
 36059                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36060                                  
 36061                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36062                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36063                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36064                                  ;	si = 0
 36065                                  ;	ax = country id
 36066                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36067                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36068                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36069                                  ;
 36070                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36071                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36072                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36073                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36075                                  
 36076 00003157 57                      	push	di
 36077 00003158 50                      	push	ax
 36078 00003159 52                      	push	dx
 36079                                  
 36080 0000315A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36081 0000315C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36082 0000315E B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36083 00003161 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36084 00003164 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36085                                  
 36086 00003166 06                      	push	es
 36087 00003167 56                      	push	si
 36088                                  
 36089 00003168 0E                      	push	cs
 36090 00003169 07                      	pop	es
 36091                                  
 36092 0000316A BF[1334]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36093 0000316D B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36094 00003170 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36095                                  
 36096 00003172 5E                      	pop	si
 36097 00003173 07                      	pop	es
 36098 00003174 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36099                                  
 36100 00003176 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36101 00003179 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36102 0000317C 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36103                                  
 36104 0000317E 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36105 0000317F 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36106 00003181 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36107 00003184 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36108 00003187 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36109 0000318A 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36110                                  
 36111 0000318C 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36112 0000318E 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36113 00003192 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36114                                  
 36115 00003194 46                      	inc	si
 36116 00003195 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36117 00003196 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36118 00003197 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36119 00003198 5F                      	pop	di
 36120                                  
 36121                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36122 00003199 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36123 0000319C 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36124                                  
 36125 0000319E 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36126 000031A1 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36127 000031A3 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36128 000031A6 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36129                                  
 36130                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36131 000031A8 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36132 000031AA 46                      	inc	si
 36133 000031AB 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36134 000031AC E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36135                                  
 36136 000031AE B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36137                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36138 000031B1 F9                      	stc
 36139 000031B2 C3                      	retn
 36140                                  
 36141                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36142 000031B3 5E                      	pop	si
 36143 000031B4 59                      	pop	cx
 36144 000031B5 5F                      	pop	di
 36145 000031B6 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36146                                  
 36147                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36148 000031B8 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36149                                  
 36150                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36151 000031BB 2E8916[1B34]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36152 000031C0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36153 000031C3 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36154 000031C6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36155 000031C9 E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36156 000031CC 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36157                                  
 36158 000031CE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36159 000031D0 46                      	inc	si
 36160 000031D1 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36161                                  
 36162                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36163 000031D2 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36164 000031D3 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 36165 000031D4 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 36166                                  
 36167 000031D5 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 36168 000031D8 E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 36169 000031DB 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 36170                                  
 36171 000031DD 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36172 000031E0 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36173 000031E3 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36174 000031E6 F9                      	stc
 36175 000031E7 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36176 000031E9 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36177                                  
 36178 000031EB BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36179 000031EE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36180 000031F1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36181 000031F3 F9                      	stc
 36182 000031F4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36183 000031F6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36184                                  
 36185 000031F8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36186 000031FA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36187                                  
 36188 000031FC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36189 000031FF 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36190 00003202 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36191 00003205 F9                      	stc
 36192 00003206 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36193 00003208 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36194                                  
 36195 0000320A 56                      	push	si
 36196 0000320B BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36197 0000320E 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36198 00003210 5E                      	pop	si
 36199 00003211 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36200 00003214 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36201 00003217 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36202 00003219 F9                      	stc
 36203 0000321A CD21                    	int	21h
 36204 0000321C 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36205                                  
 36206 0000321E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36207 00003220 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36208                                  
 36209 00003222 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 36210 00003225 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36211 00003228 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36212 0000322A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36213 0000322B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36214 0000322C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36215 00003230 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36216                                  
 36217                                  	;if	bugfix
 36218 00003232 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36219                                  	;endif
 36220                                  
 36221 00003235 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36222 00003237 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36223                                  
 36224 00003239 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36225                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36226 0000323D 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36227                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36228

 36230                                  
 36231 00003242 50                      	push	ax
 36232 00003243 2EA1[1B34]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 36233 00003247 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 36234 0000324A 58                      	pop	ax
 36235

 36238 0000324D 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?
 36239 0000324F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_data_next
 36240

 36242 00003252 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 36243                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 36244 00003256 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 36245                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 36246                                  
 36247                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 36248 0000325A 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 36249 0000325B 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left

 36251 0000325D 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 36252 0000325F 46                      	inc	si

 36254 00003261 49                      	dec	cx
 36255 00003262 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 36256 00003265 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 36257 00003267 E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 36258

 36260                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 36261                                  	;retn

 36265                                  	;if	bugfix

 36270 0000326E 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 36271 00003272 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so

 36280 00003281 59                      	pop	cx
