 36291                                  getcountrydestination:
 36292                                  
 36293                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36294                                  ;input: al - data id
 36295                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36296                                  ;on return:
 36297                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36298                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36299                                  
 36300 00003285 51                      	push	cx
 36301                                  	;add	di,74
 36302 00003286 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36303                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36304 00003289 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36305 0000328C 47                      	inc	di
 36306 0000328D 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36307                                  
 36308                                  getcntrydest:
 36309 0000328E 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 36310 00003291 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 36311 00003293 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 36312 00003297 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 36313                                  
 36314 00003299 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 36315 0000329C EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 36316                                  
 36317                                  getcntrydest_1:
 36318                                  	;add	di,41
 36319 0000329E 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 36320                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 36321 000032A1 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 36322 000032A3 F9                      	stc
 36323 000032A4 EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 36324                                  
 36325                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 36326 000032A6 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 36327 000032A8 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 36328                                  
 36329 000032AA 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 36330 000032AB EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 36331                                  
 36332                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 36333 000032AD 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 36334                                  
 36335                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 36336 000032B1 59                      	pop	cx
 36337 000032B2 C3                      	retn
 36338                                  
 36339                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36340                                  
 36341                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36342                                  
 36343                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36344                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36345                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36346                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36347                                  ;	 be moved.
 36348                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36349                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36350                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36351                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36352                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36353                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36354                                  
 36355 000032B3 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36356 000032B4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36357 000032B7 F9                      	stc
 36358 000032B8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36359 000032BA 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36360 000032BB 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36361                                  
 36362 000032BD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36363 000032BF 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36364 000032C1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36365 000032C3 F9                      	stc
 36366 000032C4 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36367                                  ricb_exit:
 36368 000032C6 C3                      	retn
 36369                                  
 36370                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36371                                  
 36372                                  set_country_path:
 36373                                  
 36374                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36375                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36376                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36377                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36378                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36379                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36380                                  
 36381 000032C7 56                      	push	si
 36382                                  
 36383 000032C8 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36384 000032C9 06                      	push	es
 36385 000032CA 1F                      	pop	ds
 36386 000032CB 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 36387                                  
 36388 000032CC E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 36389 000032CF 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 36390                                  
 36391 000032D1 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36392 000032D3 46                      	inc	si
 36393 000032D4 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 36394 000032D5 EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 36395                                  
 36396                                  scp_default_drv:
 36397 000032D7 B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36398 000032D9 CD21                    	int	21h
 36399 000032DB 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36400                                  
 36401                                  scp_setdrv:
 36402 000032DD 2EA2[D033]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36403 000032E1 BF[D333]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36404 000032E4 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36405 000032E6 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36406 000032E8 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36407                                  
 36408 000032EA 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36409 000032EC 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36410                                  
 36411 000032EE EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36412                                  
 36413                                  scp_root_dir:
 36414 000032F0 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 36415                                  scp_path:
 36416 000032F1 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36417                                  
 36418 000032F4 BF[D033]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36419                                  scpath_exit:
 36420                                  
 36421 000032F7 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36422 000032F8 06                      	push	es
 36423 000032F9 1F                      	pop	ds
 36424 000032FA 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36425                                  
 36426 000032FB 5E                      	pop	si
 36427 000032FC C3                      	retn
 36428                                  
 36429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36430                                  
 36431                                  chk_drive_letter:
 36432                                  
 36433                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36434                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36435                                  ;carry set if not.
 36436                                  
 36437 000032FD 50                      	push	ax
 36438 000032FE 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 36439                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 36440 00003301 720E                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 36441 00003303 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 36442 00003306 7708                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 36443 00003308 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 36444 0000330C 7502                    	jne	short cdletter_no
 36445                                  
 36446 0000330E EB01                    	jmp	short cdletter_exit
 36447                                  
 36448                                  cdletter_no:
 36449 00003310 F9                      	stc
 36450                                  cdletter_exit:
 36451 00003311 58                      	pop	ax
 36452 00003312 C3                      	retn
 36453                                  
 36454                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36455                                  
 36456                                  move_asciiz:
 36457                                  
 36458                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 36459                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 36460                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 36461                                  
 36462                                  masciiz_loop:
 36463 00003313 A4                      	movsb
 36464 00003314 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 36465 00003318 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
 36466 0000331A C3                      	retn
 36467                                  
 36468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36469                                  
 36470                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 36471                                  ;
 36472                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 36473                                  
 36474                                  badfil:
 36475 0000331B 0E                      	push	cs
 36476 0000331C 07                      	pop	es
 36477                                  
 36478 0000331D 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 36479                                  badload:
 36480 0000331F BA[5B37]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 36481 00003322 BB[1837]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 36482                                  prnerr:
 36483 00003325 0E                      	push	cs
 36484 00003326 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 36485 00003327 E81D00                  	call	print
 36486                                  prn1:
 36487 0000332A 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 36488 0000332D 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 36489 0000332F 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 36490 00003331 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 36491 00003333 CD21                    	int	21h
 36492 00003335 46                      	inc	si
 36493 00003336 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 36494                                  prn2:
 36495 00003338 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 36496 0000333A E80A00                  	call	print
 36497                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36498                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 36499 0000333D 803E[D103]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1 ; suppress line number when handling command.com
 36500                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 36501 00003342 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 36502                                  	
 36503                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36504                                  	;call	error_line
 36505 00003344 E9CFF3                  	jmp	error_line
 36506                                  ;prnexit:
 36507                                  	;retn
 36508                                  
 36509                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36510                                  
 36511                                  print:
 36512 00003347 B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 36513 00003349 CD21                    	int	21h
 36514                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 36515 0000334B C3                      	retn
